news.title: Blackpink Share New Song “Jump” Amid Deadline World Tour: Watch the Video
news.summary: Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa are back together for the first track since 2023

news.title: Justin Bieber Surprise-Releases New Album Swag: Listen
news.summary: Mk.gee, Dijon, Lil B, Sexyy Red, Tobias Jesso Jr., 2 Chainz, and others contribute on the pop superstar’s out-of-nowhere follow-up to 2021’s Justice

news.title: Travis Scott Shares Jackboys 2 Release Date
news.summary: The sequel to 2019’s Cactus Jack label compilation is set to drop this Sunday, July 13

news.title: Hopscotch Music Festival 2025 Lineup: Earl Sweatshirt, Sparks, My Morning Jacket, and More
news.summary: Built to Spill, Godspeed You! Black Emperor, Crumb, YHWH Nailgun, Geese, Nilüfer Yanya, and others will perform at the Raleigh festival in September
